description: Demolition of the former day centre and redevelopment of the site to provide an apartment block rising to 5 storeys comprising 13 flats (4 x 1 bedroom and 9 x 2 bedroom), 14 houses rising to 3 storeys (10 x 3 bedroom and 4 x 4 bedroom), and one apartment block rising to 5 storeys comprising 40 studio flats with an element of care (Use Class C3(b)) with associated amenity space and landscaping, the creation of a new loop road, car parking, cycle storage and refuse storage
site_name: Stonebridge Primary School Annexe, Twybridge Way, London, NW10 0ST
